title: Illinois high court rejects challenge to wind-generated transmission line
description: The Illinois Supreme Court ruled 6-0 to uphold a permit for the Grain Belt Express transmission line, facilitating wind power transport from Kansas to Indiana.
content: The Illinois Supreme Court ruled 6-0 to uphold a permit for the Grain Belt Express transmission line, facilitating wind power transport from Kansas to Indiana.
